text: Zayn Malik is not a fan of the Met Gala - and he doesn't care who knows it. The singer, 25, detailed his distaste for the exclusive soiree in a new interview with GQ, claiming that while he attended the event in 2016, he did so in an ironic way.'I did go, but I didn't go there to be like, ` ` Yo, take me serious,'''he told the publication.'I was taking the p * * s! I went there as my favorite Mortal Kombat character, Jax.'Not a fan : Zayn Malik, 25, detailed his distaste for the Met gala in a new interview.
